name: Stitcher
description:
|
v



WASD or ARROWS for moving Karim.

Press F2 for Fullscreen (recommended but only working in a standalone flash player)


The game was originally meant as entry for the LD30 'Connected Worlds'

Didn't finish in time so i've invested some additional time to make it a playable (and hopefully enjoyable) game.

Let me know, what you think of it!

--

"The text/translation could use a good going over in this inventive, detailed indie puzzler, but I just love the idea at its heart. ..."

- PCGamer

--

You can download the SWF here.


Programming, Design by Christoph Schnerr

Music by Jule Baetz


Made with Flashpunk


Thanks :))
